name: GrimAC Blatant 1.8 PVP
description: Hyper-optimized blatant configuration for bypassing GrimAC on 1.8 PVP servers. Features precise rotations, timing, and movement patterns designed specifically for Grim's prediction engine.

Reach.comment: DO NOT USE - Grim detects reach perfectly

HitBox.comment: DO NOT USE - Grim detects hitbox expansion

NoSlow.comment: Use vanilla mode for Grim compatibility

Wtap.comment: Packet mode is safer for Grim

Scaffold.comment: Use Clutch module instead for better Grim bypass

Eagle.comment: Not needed with proper Clutch configuration

TargetStrafe.comment: Grim can detect unrealistic strafing patterns

Speed.comment: DO NOT USE - Grim has perfect speed detection

Fly.comment: DO NOT USE - Grim has perfect fly detection

LongJump.comment: DO NOT USE - Grim detects longjump instantly

FastPlace.comment: May trigger scaffolding checks on Grim

NoFall.comment: DO NOT USE - Grim has sophisticated fall damage checks

notes.general: This configuration is specifically designed for GrimAC on 1.8.x servers
notes.killaura: GRIM autoblock mode uses precise timing windows that work with Grim's prediction engine. 16-18 APS is aggressive but within human capability.
notes.clutch: Grim antivoid mode uses hyper-precise void detection and placement timing. Telly mode provides safer clutches by moving to edge before placing.
notes.movement: All movement-based cheats are DISABLED because Grim has nearly perfect movement prediction
notes.reach: NEVER use reach or hitbox expansion - Grim calculates exact interaction distances
notes.rotations: Silent rotations with proper movement fix are safe. Grim checks server-side rotations match actions.
notes.velocity: 90% horizontal reduction is safe on most servers. Grim allows some velocity modification.
notes.antifireball: shoot-up mode prevents fireball self-damage while maintaining legitimacy
notes.important: This config prioritizes SAFETY over POWER. Adjust APS/ranges based on your skill and server strictness.
advanced_tips: Lower APS to 14-16 for safer play on strict servers
Disable Clutch telly-mode if experiencing rubberbands
Use Clutch only in emergencies - frequent use may look suspicious
Keep movements natural - don't strafe perfectly or move robotically
Vary your play style - don't always use max APS or perfect aim
On very strict servers, use LEGIT autoblock instead of GRIM
Monitor your ping - high ping makes bypass harder

HIGH: Using max settings on all modules simultaneously

author: Rovo Dev
